title: srI raama jayaraama shringaara
sahitya:
shrI rAma jayarAma shrngAra rAma

caraNam 1

 gAravamuna brOvu karuNA samudra
   
caraNam 2

 nAlOni jAli nIkEla tOcadurA
   
caraNam 3

 manasinci nAtOnu mATAduna depuDu
   
caraNam 4

 tALa nIvELa nika jAlamA rAma
   
caraNam 5

 balimini valacitE calamA O rAma
   
caraNam 6

 I saukhya mI bhAgyamendaina galadA
   
caraNam 7

 japamEmO tapamEmO aparAdhamEmO
   
caraNam 8

 pankaja nayana nA kumkuma nIvE
   
caraNam 9

 avanijAdhipa nA sogasEvaridE rAma
 
caraNam 10

 nIvu nimiSamu lEni bhAvuka mElE
 
caraNam 11

 tOSimpa kennaLLu tOcunE rAma
 
caraNam 12

 ella saukhyamulu manasolladE rAma
 
caraNam 13

 pAyaga mEnu sagamAyenO rAma
 
caraNam 14

 I anda mI canda mendaina galadA
 
caraNam 15

 kUrcu vetalArcu kaDa tErcavE rAma
 
caraNam 16

 mikkili mrokki cE jikkiti rAma
 
caraNam 17

 ranjillu shrI tyAgarAjAdi vinuta
